Reviews.Title: “Great location, very nice people and good rooms”

Reviews.Content: surprised bit 50 eur especially center close metro metro pass didnt hostal walking distance main touristic prado pl puerta del sol gran via thyssen museum museum reina sofia reached 30 min walk people hostal friendly smiley available question advice whatever basic clean private bathroom bed closet double couple bed 2 maybe add note mattress definitely recommend hostal
